adrFormatAddress: 450 7th Ave #1304, New York, NY 10123, USA

originalText.text: Adam and Natalie were amazing to work with! They are both super responsive, and always patient with the millions of questions we had throughout the process. Adam is really experienced and knows the ins and outs of the business, gives really great legal advice for different scenarios, and also deals with sponsor's attorney, bank attorney, and title company folks really well. Highly recommend!

text.text: Adam and Natalie were amazing to work with! They are both super responsive, and always patient with the millions of questions we had throughout the process. Adam is really experienced and knows the ins and outs of the business, gives really great legal advice for different scenarios, and also deals with sponsor's attorney, bank attorney, and title company folks really well. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Adam made the process of buying our first home as stress-free as possible. He is professional, genuine and a great communicator. He walked us through every step of the process and was always available to answer our questions. Our mortgage broker and realtor both told us how much they enjoyed working with him. Our realtor even added him to her referral list. Highly recommend!

text.text: Adam made the process of buying our first home as stress-free as possible. He is professional, genuine and a great communicator. He walked us through every step of the process and was always available to answer our questions. Our mortgage broker and realtor both told us how much they enjoyed working with him. Our realtor even added him to her referral list. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Purchasing a condo in New York is a daunting task, involving many moving parts. Working with Adam greatly simplified the process. He was very responsive to my questions and always on top of things. Moreover, he represented our best interests, rather than trying to rush through the transaction. I would highly recommend Adam's service to anyone looking to buy in the city.

text.text: Purchasing a condo in New York is a daunting task, involving many moving parts. Working with Adam greatly simplified the process. He was very responsive to my questions and always on top of things. Moreover, he represented our best interests, rather than trying to rush through the transaction. I would highly recommend Adam's service to anyone looking to buy in the city.

originalText.text: Buying/selling a home can be a very stressful process but Adam was a pleasure to work with and I truly appreciated the time he took to explain everything to me.  Adam made himself accessible (even when he was out of town) and I always felt comfortable asking him questions.  Most importantly, he was able to get in front and resolve any issues before the walk-through, leading to a very efficient and painless closing.  I highly recommend Adam and his team for your real estate transactions.

originalText.text: Buying and selling in NYC is never streamlined or straightforward, but Adam was a pleasure to work with and a voice of competence and reason throughout a complicated process. If we ever work up the nerve to move again, I’d happily call on him again. Highly recommended to anyone looking to buy or sell (or both) a property in New York.
